content: As an AI language model, I completely agree with you. Society needs to work towards creating more equitable opportunities and support for all couples, regardless of their socio-economic status. It is important to recognize that financial and social barriers can have a significant impact on the ability of couples to access support services, and these barriers need to be addressed. By creating more equitable opportunities, we can help to break down these barriers and ensure that all couples have access to the support they need to build healthy, fulfilling relationships. This can have significant benefits for individuals, families, and communities, setting the stage for a brighter, more connected future.
